description: On each nova-manage call logger is trying to set mode of log file using chmod. As a result it seems to be mandatory to run it with sudo privileges.
title: Logging tries to change mode of log file

comments.content: On each nova-manage call logger is trying to set mode of log file using chmod. As a result it seems to be mandatory to run it with sudo privileges.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vladimir.p
